short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your accounts with relayed emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay protected online with our powerful Chrome extension that hides your real email address on the websites you visit. By seamlessly generating and autofilling unique, disposable email addresses, our extension ensures your privacy and security. These fake email addresses forward all received messages to your actual inbox, allowing you to manage communications effortlessly while keeping your personal email private.

Additionally, our extension provides a comprehensive dashboard where you can manage all your generated email addresses in one place. Easily track which websites have your information and identify any that may have leaked or misused your email. Enjoy a safer browsing experience, avoid spam, and take control of your online privacy with our intuitive and easy-to-use solution.

Access the dashboard with CTRL + SHIFT + E.
